entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Guelph
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:22 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Guelph Turfgrass Institute 1:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: 1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 56 %
Dewpoint: -6.3°C
Wind: WNW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero with temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning early in the morning and ending near noon then 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 near noon then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High zero with temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
